Hello everybody

I wish to know of experiences in using NEAT for static NN =
models. By 
this I mean, I perform several experiments using design of 
exp=
eriments. Using the results I build a neural network model, most 
of the ti=
mes guessing what the appropriate size and parameters of 
the network shoul=
d be. 

I do not build the models incrementally, rather I build them as an =

one-time affair. The problems I face are the following:

Given the number =
of inputs (x) and the number of outputs (y) and the 
size of the training s=
et,I have trouble estimating what is the 
appropriate parameters for buildi=
ng the network? (like learning 
rate, size of network, what kind of algorit=
hm etc.)

Do the experts feel that NEAT will be able to answer such queries=
 
for me ? or can I use NEAT to build models without having to worry 
about=
 the network parameters? or Do I have it completely wrong about 
NEAT?

Tha=
nks for your suggestions.

Sathya
